attributes.action: Let students wear their own clothes to school
attributes.additional_details: Children will feel more comfortable and less money would be spent on uniforms
attributes.background: Make this change so that students can wear their own clothes to school instead of uniforms

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about whether to have a school uniform are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament. We could accept a petition calling on the Government to ban schools from being able to set a school uniform, if that's something you'd like to happen.
